name: Stranger (itch) (Bittermurmur)
description:
Stranger is a short indie horror game about a girl who was going back from her evening school. But this day it went  differently.

Average playtime: ~10 mins.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • E\F for interaction

He is watching you.
It is recommended to play with a lights off and with a headphones.

There are 3 endings.

I would really appreciate if you rate the game and leave me a comment! 
If you have anything to share - please contact me: mermaids.tale.00@gmail.com
I will be forever grateful for your support in any way. Hope you will enjoy this game!
